title: Onboarding and Induction
content:
Module 9, Lesson 3: Onboarding and Induction

Introduction

This lesson covers Onboarding and Induction as part of the HR & Talent Management module in the Learn Management course. Mastery of this topic is essential for building a comprehensive understanding of the subject area.

Key Concepts

In Onboarding and Induction, you will explore the foundational ideas, practical techniques, and real-world applications that make this area of study both relevant and actionable. Each concept has been carefully selected to build on prior knowledge and prepare you for more advanced topics.

Practical Application

Understanding Onboarding and Induction means being able to apply these principles in professional contexts. You will encounter scenarios, case studies, and examples drawn from real industry practice, helping you translate theory into competence.

Summary

You have completed Onboarding and Induction (HR & Talent Management, Lesson 3). Proceed to the quiz to test your understanding, then continue to the next lesson to build further expertise.

options: Identifying and developing future leaders for key roles

quiz.question: What does DEI stand for in HR?
What is HR analytics used for?

quiz.question: What is talent acquisition?
options: The process of finding and attracting skilled candidates

quiz.question: What does employee onboarding involve?
options: Integrating new hires into the organisation and its culture
